com.uber.autodispose

Class ScopeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uber.autodispose.ScopeUtil

  • public final class ScopeUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for dealing with scopes, usually for providers. This includes factories for resolving Maybe representations of scopes, corresponding events, etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ScopeUtil.LifecycleEndNotification
      A simple instance enum used to signify that the end of a lifecycle has occurred.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <E> io.reactivex.Maybe<ScopeUtil.LifecycleEndNotification> deferredResolvedLifecycle(LifecycleScopeProvider<E> provider)
      Overload for resolving lifecycle providers that defaults to checking start and end boundaries of lifecycles.
      static <E> io.reactivex.Maybe<ScopeUtil.LifecycleEndNotification> deferredResolvedLifecycle(LifecycleScopeProvider<E> provider, boolean checkStartBoundary, boolean checkEndBoundary) 
      static <E> io.reactivex.Maybe<ScopeUtil.LifecycleEndNotification> resolveScopeFromLifecycle(io.reactivex.Observable<E> lifecycle, E endEvent) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • deferredResolvedLifecycle

        public static <E> io.reactivex.Maybe<ScopeUtil.LifecycleEndNotification> deferredResolvedLifecycle(LifecycleScopeProvider<E> provider)
        Overload for resolving lifecycle providers that defaults to checking start and end boundaries of lifecycles. That is, they will ensure that the lifecycle has both started and not ended.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the lifecycle event type.
        Parameters:
        provider - the LifecycleScopeProvider to resolve.
        Returns:
        a resolved Maybe representation of a given provider

      • deferredResolvedLifecycle

        public static <E> io.reactivex.Maybe<ScopeUtil.LifecycleEndNotification> deferredResolvedLifecycle(LifecycleScopeProvider<E> provider,
                                                                                                   boolean checkStartBoundary,
                                                                                                   boolean checkEndBoundary)
        Type Parameters:
        E - the lifecycle event type
        Parameters:
        provider - the LifecycleScopeProvider to resolve.
        checkStartBoundary - whether or not to check that the lifecycle has started
        checkEndBoundary - whether or not to check that the lifecycle has ended
        Returns:
        a resolved Maybe representation of a given provider

      • resolveScopeFromLifecycle

        public static <E> io.reactivex.Maybe<ScopeUtil.LifecycleEndNotification> resolveScopeFromLifecycle(io.reactivex.Observable<E> lifecycle,
                                                                                                   E endEvent)
        Type Parameters:
        E - the lifecycle event type
        Parameters:
        lifecycle - the stream of lifecycle events
        endEvent - the target end event
        Returns:
        a resolved Maybe representation of a given lifecycle, targeting the given event
